title: ADORABLE: Endangered baby ape caught on cam making funny faces at Cincinnati Zoo
body: CINCINNATI (SBG) — A 6-month-old bonobo born at the is full of personality!In a , the endangered great ape named "Amali" pressed her mouth against the glass of her exhibit as she made funny faces.  on July 23, 2020.are critically endangered and found in the wild in the Democratic Republic of Congo.
